name: Persian
description: The Persian is one of the oldest and most popular cat breeds, known for its long, luxurious coat and sweet, gentle personality.

name: Maine Coon
description: The Maine Coon is one of the largest domestic cat breeds, known as the 'gentle giant' for its friendly, dog-like personality.

name: Ragdoll
description: Ragdolls are known for going limp when picked up, hence their name. They're extremely docile, loving cats that follow their owners around.

name: British Shorthair
description: The British Shorthair is a pedigreed version of the British domestic cat, known for its chunky body, dense coat, and broad face.

not_ideal: Those wanting a very active cat

name: Siamese
description: Siamese cats are one of the most recognizable breeds with their striking blue eyes and colorpoint coat. They're extremely vocal and social.

name: Abyssinian
description: Abyssinians are one of the oldest known breeds, known for their ticked coat and extremely active, curious nature.

name: Bengal
description: Bengals have a wild appearance with their leopard-like spots but are fully domesticated. They're highly active and love water.

name: Sphynx
description: The Sphynx is famous for being hairless, though they have a fine peach-fuzz. They're extremely affectionate and love being warm.

name: Scottish Fold
description: Scottish Folds are known for their unique folded ears and owl-like appearance. They're sweet-natured and adaptable.

not_ideal: Those concerned about genetic health issues

name: Birman
description: Birmans are known as the 'Sacred Cat of Burma' with their striking blue eyes and white 'gloves' on their paws.

name: Russian Blue
description: Russian Blues are known for their plush blue-grey coat and striking green eyes. They're shy with strangers but devoted to their family.

name: Norwegian Forest Cat
description: Norwegian Forest Cats are large, rugged cats with a thick waterproof coat developed to survive Scandinavian winters.

name: Burmese
description: Burmese cats are known for their dog-like personality, following their owners everywhere and being extremely social.

name: Oriental Shorthair
description: Oriental Shorthairs come in over 300 color combinations. They're like Siamese without the colorpoint pattern - very vocal and social.

name: Devon Rex
description: Devon Rex cats have large ears, an elfin face, and a wavy coat. They're known as 'pixie cats' for their mischievous personality.

name: Cornish Rex
description: Cornish Rex have a distinctive wavy coat and slender body. They're athletic, love to play fetch, and stay kitten-like their whole lives.

not_ideal: Those wanting a calm lap cat

name: Exotic Shorthair
description: Exotic Shorthairs are essentially short-haired Persians - same sweet face and gentle nature but with easier grooming needs.

best_for: Those who love Persians but not grooming

name: Himalayan
description: Himalayans combine Persian features with Siamese colorpoints. They're sweet, calm cats that love peaceful environments.

name: American Shorthair
description: American Shorthairs are the pedigreed version of domestic shorthairs - athletic, adaptable, and great family cats.

name: Tonkinese
description: Tonkinese are a cross between Siamese and Burmese, combining the best of both - social, playful, and loving.

name: Ragamuffin
description: Ragamuffins are similar to Ragdolls but come in more colors. They're extremely gentle, patient, and love being held.

name: Savannah
description: Savannahs are a hybrid breed (African Serval x domestic cat). They're tall, athletic, and have a wild appearance.

name: Siberian
description: Siberians are Russia's native forest cat with a luxurious triple coat. They're known to produce less Fel d 1 allergen.

name: Balinese
description: Balinese are essentially long-haired Siamese - same personality and colorpoints with a silky flowing coat.

name: Turkish Angora
description: Turkish Angoras are one of the ancient natural breeds, known for their elegant silky coat and graceful movements.

name: Turkish Van
description: Turkish Vans are known as 'swimming cats' for their love of water. They have a distinctive color pattern - white body with colored head/tail.

name: Somali
description: Somalis are long-haired Abyssinians with the same active, curious personality and beautiful ticked coat.

name: Chartreux
description: Chartreux are France's native blue cat, known for their quiet nature and sweet 'smiling' expression.

name: Ocicat
description: Ocicats look wild but are completely domestic. They're dog-like in their devotion and can learn tricks.

name: Egyptian Mau
description: Egyptian Maus are the fastest domestic cat breed and the only naturally spotted domestic cat. They're loyal but shy with strangers.

name: Singapura
description: Singapuras are the smallest cat breed but have huge personalities. They love being involved in everything.

name: Manx
description: Manx cats are known for their lack of tail (or short tail). They're playful, dog-like, and excellent hunters.

name: Japanese Bobtail
description: Japanese Bobtails have a distinctive pom-pom tail. They're the 'lucky cat' breed featured in the maneki-neko figurine.

name: American Curl
description: American Curls have unique backward-curling ears. They stay kitten-like throughout their lives and are very people-oriented.

name: Selkirk Rex
description: Selkirk Rex have a curly 'sheep-like' coat. They're the most relaxed of the Rex breeds with a patient, tolerant nature.

name: LaPerm
description: LaPerms have a unique curly coat that can range from wavy to ringlet curls. They're affectionate and love being close to people.

not_ideal: Those wanting a very active cat

name: Korat
description: Korats are one of the oldest stable cat breeds, considered good luck in Thailand. They form strong bonds with their chosen person.

name: Bombay
description: Bombays were bred to look like mini black panthers. They're incredibly affectionate and love being the center of attention.

name: Havana Brown
description: Havana Browns are rare cats with a distinctive mahogany brown coat and green eyes. They're charming and love human interaction.

name: Burmilla
description: Burmillas are a cross between Burmese and Chinchilla Persian, combining the best of both - sweet nature and beautiful silver coat.

name: Toyger
description: Toygers are bred to look like toy tigers with their bold striped pattern. Despite wild looks, they're friendly and laid-back.

name: Pixie-Bob
description: Pixie-Bobs look like bobcats but are fully domestic. They're known for their dog-like loyalty and can learn to walk on a leash.

name: Cymric
description: Cymrics are long-haired Manx cats, sharing the same tailless gene. They're gentle, playful, and bond strongly with their families.

name: American Bobtail
description: American Bobtails have a naturally short tail and wild appearance. They're known as 'golden retrievers of the cat world' for their friendly nature.

name: Nebelung
description: Nebelungs are the long-haired version of Russian Blues with the same shy, gentle nature and stunning blue coat.

name: Snowshoe
description: Snowshoes have Siamese coloring with white 'snowshoe' feet. They're social butterflies who hate being alone.

name: Chausie
description: Chausies are a hybrid breed (Jungle Cat x domestic). They're tall, athletic, and need lots of space and activity.

name: Sokoke
description: Sokokes are a natural breed from Kenya with a distinctive modified tabby pattern. They're athletic and bond strongly with families.

name: Australian Mist
description: Australian Mists are Australia's first pedigreed breed, developed to be the perfect indoor companion - tolerant, gentle, and low-maintenance.

name: Peterbald
description: Peterbalds can range from bald to brush-coated. They're elegant, dog-like in devotion, and love being warm.

name: Donskoy
description: Donskoys are Russian hairless cats with a different gene than the Sphynx. They're extremely social and can even have 'winter coats'.

name: Kurilian Bobtail
description: Kurilian Bobtails come from the Kuril Islands. They're excellent fishers with a pom-pom tail and gentle, trusting nature.

name: American Wirehair
description: American Wirehairs have a unique springy, crimped coat. They're adaptable, quiet, and make excellent companions.

name: European Shorthair
description: European Shorthairs are the pedigreed version of European domestic cats - hardy, healthy, and versatile.

name: Brazilian Shorthair
description: Brazilian Shorthairs are Brazil's first pedigreed breed, developed from street cats of Brazil. They're friendly and adaptable.

name: Khao Manee
description: Khao Manees are ancient Thai cats, known as 'White Gem'. Many have odd-colored eyes (one blue, one gold).

name: Lykoi
description: Lykoi, or 'Werewolf Cat', has a unique partially hairless coat. Despite spooky looks, they're friendly and dog-like.

name: Munchkin
description: Munchkins have naturally short legs but are just as active as other cats. They're playful and love to collect shiny things.

name: Highlander
description: Highlanders have curled ears and often a bobbed tail. They're confident, clownish, and love being the center of attention.

name: Serengeti
description: Serengetis were bred to look like wild Servals but are fully domestic. They're tall, spotted, and very active.

name: Thai
description: Thai cats are the traditional, old-style Siamese with a less extreme body type. They're social, vocal, and loving.

name: Chantilly-Tiffany
description: Chantilly-Tiffanies have a gorgeous silky coat and devoted personality. They're moderate in energy and very loyal.

name: York Chocolate
description: York Chocolates are a rare American breed with rich chocolate or lavender colored coats. They're friendly farm-cat types.

name: Colorpoint Shorthair
description: Colorpoint Shorthairs are essentially Siamese in non-traditional colors (red, cream, tortie, lynx points).

name: Javanese
description: Javanese are long-haired Colorpoint Shorthairs - same Siamese personality with a silky coat in various point colors.

name: Oriental Longhair
description: Oriental Longhairs are the long-haired version of Oriental Shorthairs - elegant, vocal, and extremely social.

name: British Longhair
description: British Longhairs are the long-haired version of British Shorthairs - same calm nature with a luxurious fluffy coat.

name: Asian
description: Asian cats are Burmese-type cats in non-traditional colors and patterns. They share the loving Burmese personality.

name: Tiffanie
description: Tiffanies are the semi-longhaired version of the Burmilla, combining the beautiful silver coat with a gentle nature.

name: California Spangled
description: California Spangled cats were bred to resemble wild leopards. They're athletic, curious, and love to hunt and play.

name: Dragon Li
description: Dragon Li (Chinese Li Hua) is China's only recognized native breed. They're intelligent, independent, and make good hunters.

name: Suphalak
description: Suphalaks are ancient Thai cats, mentioned in the Cat Book Poems. They have a unique copper/brown coat and loving nature.

name: Aphrodite Giant
description: Aphrodite Giants are a natural breed from Cyprus, known for their large size and gentle nature. They're one of the oldest breeds.

name: Cyprus
description: Cyprus cats are the domestic cats native to the island of Cyprus, with a history going back thousands of years.
